EmailTemplate.description: Agency has reviewed the request and determined that it’s a different service request type than was original submitted. Agency has closed the original request and opened a new one with the correct service request type
EmailTemplate.name: SR HTML Changed Service Request Type
EmailTemplate.subject: Your 311 Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear resident,
{!Case.Servicing_Agency_Expanded__c} has just reviewed your request for {!Case.Subject} and has determined that it should be changed to a different service request type.
Agency comments: why was service request was changed to a new service request.
We have closed the original request. <<Agency Name>> will now be handling your new service request for <<new service request name>>. Your new service request number is <<New SERVICE REQUEST NUMBER>>. This request should be complete by <<expected resolution date>>.
There is nothing for you to do at this time. This email is for informational purposes only.
Please visit 311.dc.gov to check the status of your request or to find answers to frequently asked questions. You may also call 311, and reference service request number: <<SERVICE REQUEST NUMBER>> to check your status or get help with questions. An agent will be happy to answer your questions, concerns or connect you with the correct department.
Thanks again for contacting the Mayor’s 311 Hotline.
